author: djencks
msg: GERONIMO-3303 Major simplification of authentication framework.  Removes remote login and supporting code

author: azeez
msg: If the IP corresponding to the hostname in the /etc/hosts file is mapped to a local IP address, we should not allow this node to join the cluster, since this node will start adverting its IP address
as 127.0.0.1 or 127.0.1.1 or something, which means that other nodes will not be able to communicate with this node.
